column6: Lions, Minotaurs, Medusas, oh my! Looks like Wolverine and Hercules have made someone angry this time. Matsuo-back from the dead-and his new partner in revenge, King Eurystheus, are raising mythical beasts from the dead hoping to take down the two heroes. It's a knock-down, drag-out fight as Wolverine and Hercules struggle to stay alive! Don't miss the action from FRANK TIERI and JUAN SANTACRUZ, with covers by the legendary JOE JUSKO!
column8: | editor:Charlie Beckerman | penciller (cover):Joe Jusko | penciller:Juan Santacruz | writer:Frank Tieri
